"CHLOROPHYLL-SPECIFIC ABSORPTION" coefficient, achl*(wavelength) in m^2/mg, 
based on the equation: abs(chl) = A x Chl^(-B) x Chl  =A x Chl^(1-B) 




this lines are leave blank to consistent with other IOP files
